content.description: Robinhood has launched a Layer 2 blockchain and broadened its crypto services in both the EU and US, adding features like staking and perpetual futures.
Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell stated he’s keeping the door open to potential interest rate cuts in the near term.
Platinum prices have surged, marking their biggest monthly rise in nearly 40 years.

outlook: Markets are showing signs of renewed volatility and opportunity. Robinhood’s expansion into blockchain and derivatives signals continued fintech innovation. Meanwhile, the Fed hints at possible rate cuts, and commodities like platinum are surging—pointing to shifting investor sentiment.
